GSD.description:
clk: qcom: ipq8074: dont disable gcc_sleep_clk_src

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.63 by commit 17d58499dc9c7e059dab7d170e9bae1e7e9c561b. For more details please see the references link.
